attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Would like to petition against, Islam4UK demonstrating/protesting at any future Armed Forces Parades in the UK, Including Outgoing & Homecoming Parades for our currently serving men and women of the Armed Forces, finally any Parade for our fallen heros of the Armed Forces in the town of Wootton Bassett.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
